dialogue: I checked every room, she’s not answering her phone. But she should have her Lyfe Line.
Has she ever wandered off before?
It’s confusing the things she can and can’t chew. Like, she can’t have a salad but last week she ate a cashew?
Hang on, so she’s never wandered off - aside from returning to a salad bar by choice?
You know one of our residents is missing too. Ben Halpern. Are the two of them... involved?
Wow. Okay. Well... thank you for that information.
And she had the TGA, right?
But she’s a tough cookie. Obviously we want help tracking her down. But there’s still a chance it’s a “going back to the buffet” type situation.
The good news is they rarely go far.
